Name: Crusader M2 Hercules Starlifter
Description:
Manufacturer: Crusader Industries
Focus: Medium Freight / Combat

The M2 Hercules is the UEE's premier tactical starlifter. The large-scale transport's potent combination of capacity, maneuverability, durability, and robust weapons package assures your cargo and crew get to where they’re going in one piece.
